description: {"blocks":[{"key":"1lfqc","text":"This standard operating procedure describes nested PCR protocols for the generation of amplicons from V. cholerae and S. typhi.   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ernpk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4c1n4","text":"PCR primers have been sourced from the literature or designed using Geneious, with primer pooling tested to minimise primer-primer interactions. Whilst the first round of PCR may be sufficient alone for detection (and will yield larger amplicons) a second round of PCR has been included to increase sensitivity.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9l9b5","text":"Workstation Preparation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6pffh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d065t","text":"Clean the PCR areas before setting up the reactions; clean room for the master mix and an area for the addition of the template. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ea558","text":"Clean the working area and pipettors with an approved DNAse inhibitor solution.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"94srh","text":"Clean the Class II biosafety cabinet and pipettes with 70% ethanol and wipe with a paper towel.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cvarb","text":"Place a disposal Dispo-safe “sweetie” jar or bio-bin on the bench. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dfjll","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7hfjv","text":"Sample Retrieval","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dtmd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cqu59","text":"Place a rack inside a polystyrene sample box for sample transfer.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fbsov","text":"Remove tube containing the required samples from the -80 °C freezer.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5c2uu","text":"Close freezer and polystyrene box. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4qa06","text":"Allow the samples to thaw on ice. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
